title: Instrument Margin Rate
description: Margin or rate calculated for an instrument

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: MIC code of the exchange/market where the instrument is listed

currency.description: Currency for which the fee is calculated (ex: BRL, USD)

marketPrice.description: Market price of the instrument (amount in 'currency', up to 2 decimal places)

collateralMarginRate.description: Margin rate in percentage (0-100), up to 4 decimal places. Ex.: '7', '7.1253', '100.0000

riskPositionValueLong.description: Value of the purchased position considered for risk (in 'currency' currency)

riskPositionValueShort.description: Value of the position sold considered for risk (in 'currency')
